comments.body: I'm wondering if we need this. For barrier stage we always retry the entire stage, so `index` must be equal to partitionId.
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -50,6 +50,7 @@ private[spark] class TaskDescription(
     val executorId: String,
     val name: String,
     val index: Int,    // Index within this task's TaskSet
+    val partitionId: Int,

comments.body: Actually you are right on this, but that makes the logic a little more difficult to understand, so I prefer to use `partitionId` explicitly.
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -50,6 +50,7 @@ private[spark] class TaskDescription(
     val executorId: String,
     val name: String,
     val index: Int,    // Index within this task's TaskSet
+    val partitionId: Int,
